content: standard sock socks are my favorite i have been making and teaching socks for many years this is my basic toe-up reinforced heel flap recipe it is worked in a heavy fingering weight yarn knitted tighter than suggested gauge so that it will wear for a long time my oldest pair of socks is 9 years old no holes yet as the pattern is written these are suitable to be worked in magic loop or on 2 circular needles the sizes listed are in us shoe sizes for guidance in narrowing down which size to knit these are meant to be worn with negative ease choose a size with finished measurements of about ½-1 inch less than your measurement foot length and leg length are adjustable to the individual knitter and toe-up socks are easy to try on as you go which i encourage you to do often to alter length of the foot add or subtract rounds between the end of the toe section and the beginning of the gusset increases to alter length of the leg add or subtract rounds after your heel is completed and before you start your cuff ribbing or add extra cuff ribbing for length i wouldn t recommend subtracting cuff ribbing or you will have a roll-y cuff skills required judy s magic cast-on here http //knitty com/issuespring06/featmagiccaston html working in the round using either magic loop https //tutorials knitpicks com/magic-loop/ or 2 circular method https //tutorials knitpicks com/knitting-in-the-round-with-2-circular- needles/ increasing short row bind off using a stretchy method https //www interweave com/article/knitting/a-stretchier-bind- off/ materials 100g fingering weight 28sts/4 sock yarn * the sample is a scrappy sock i used two different colors of patons kroy some handmaiden casbah and a mystery yarn…i cannot remember what it is… *a note on yarn selection* i like a sturdy wool/nylon blend of yarn something that holds up well i want a long service from my socks after all the time i put in making them for this pattern i would recommend sock yarn that knits to 28sts/4 some examples are patons kroy cascade heritage koigu drops fabel tosh sock knitpicks hawthorne or felici this is only a fraction of what is available there are also some spectacular independent dyers out there whose sock yarn is magical check out ravelry and instagram for inspiration 2 5mm circulars 32 length for magic loop or 2 pairs 2 5mm circulars 16 length for socks using 2 circular needles darning needle gauge 32sts/4 and 11rounds/4 size & measurements us shoe size ball of your foot finished sock circumference measurement at ball of foot unblocked ladies 6-7 7-8 7 ladies 8-9 mens 9-10 8-9 8 ladies 9-10 mens 11-12 9-10 9 abbreviations k - knit st - stitch p - purl sts - stitches kf&b - knit in to front and back of st increase 1 st st - stockinette stitch st co - cast on n1 - needle 1 p2tog - purl next two sts together decrease 1 st
